revision.text: Possibly: Thoughts on general and partial inoculations. Containing a translation of two treatises written when the author was at Petersburg, and published there ... in the Russian language. ... By ... Baron Thomas Dimsdale. (London : Printed by William Richardson for W. Owen ... and T. Carnan and F. Newbery, 1776). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1396802~S1
